DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare systematic local infiltration Ropivacaine 0.5 % versus Ropivacaine 0.2 % versus Placebo patient undergo elective caesarean section . The hypothesis systemic local infiltration reduce pain postoperative opioid consumption .
DOC.brief_title: Local Infiltration Analgesia With Ropivacaine Versus Placebo Caesarean Section
DOC.criteria: eligible elective caesarean section able speak understand Danish able give inform consent alcohol medical abuse allergy local anesthetic age < 18 year intolerance opioids
